
## Class : iris smooth muscle

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0004234
 * *Label* = iris smooth muscle
 * *Definition* = A portion of smooth muscle tissue that is part of a iris [Automatically generated definition].
 * *Comment* = Editor notes: see notes for muscle of iris.

## Synonyms

 * iridial smooth muscle
 * iris involuntary muscle
 * iris non-striated muscle
 * iris smooth muscle tissue
 * non-striated muscle of iris
 * smooth muscle of iris
 * smooth muscle tissue of iris
